history.narrative: Law 7-27 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-228, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 16, 1987 and June 30, 1987, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 17, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 7-49 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
